title: I Am Groot In Review - Every Marvel Movie Ranked & Recapped
description:
Go to http://chime.com/KFGAMES to get started with Chime today.

Go to http://meundies.com/kindafunny to get 20% off your first order plus free shipping.

This episode of Kinda Funny In Review Rewatch we rank, review, and recap the 2022 Marvel Studios MCU show I Am Groot on Disney Plus starring Vin Diesel and Bradley Cooper.
